title: Belgium Retail Sales YoY
description: Retail Sales in Belgium decreased 0.90 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Retail Sales YoY in Belgium averaged 1.32 percent from 1992 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 19 percent in April of 2021 and a record low of -10.50 percent in April of 2020. In Belgium, the year-over-year change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the same month a year ago. This page provides - Belgium Retail Sales YoY - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
